error.not_intentional: If you believe this is an error, please report it [here]({url}).
error.unknown: An unknown error has happened! Please report it [here]({url}).
error.unknown_voice_state: I can't determine your voice state, check my permissions, or if you're in a voice chat.
error.cant_connect: I can't join your voice chat. Check if I have permission to access it.
error.not_in_voice_chat: You can't control the music player from outside the voice chat.
error.player_exists: There's already a music player in another voice chat.
error.player_not_exists: There's no music player on this server.
error.empty_queue: There're no musics in the queue.

play.name: play
play.description: Request music to be played, enqueuing it in the queue or playing immediately if empty.
play.query_description: A music or playlist URL, or a search term.
play.play_multi: **{count}** musics from your playlist have been queued, **{name}** from **{author}** has been selected to play now.
play.play_multi_url: **{count}** musics from your playlist have been queued, [**{name}**]({url}) from **{author}** has been selected to play now.
play.enqueue_single: **{name}** by **{author}** has been added to the queue.
play.enqueue_single_url: [**{name}**]({url}) by **{author}** has been added to the queue.
play.enqueue_multi: **{count}** musics from your playlist have been queued.
play.not_found: I can't find the requested music.
play.truncated: You can't add more music to the queue as the queue is already at the allowed limit. Please remove some music before trying again.
play.truncated_warn: **Warning: I need to ignore some music from your playlist because it's larger than the allowed limit.**

player.title: Hydrogen: Music Player
player.timeout: There's no one else connected to me on voice chat. I will leave in {time} seconds.

join.name: join
join.description: Make me join your voice chat without playing anything.
join.joined: I have joined your voice chat, and now you can request any music using {play}.

stop.stopped: I'm leaving the voice chat. Hope to see you soon.

loop.looping: Queue's loop mode has changed to **{loop}**.

pause.paused: You have paused the music player.
pause.resumed: You have resumed the music player.

seek.name: seek
seek.description: Seek for the time in the current music playing.
seek.time_description: Time in seconds or a supported syntax.
seek.invalid_syntax: Invalid time time syntax. You can use numbers as seconds or suffix them with `m` to be minutes or `h` to be hours. You can also use `00:00` or `00:00:00` to set the hours.

about.name: about
about.description: Show information about the bot and its software.
